markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goblin Weapon Frenzy](/Feats.aspx?ID=47) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 49 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Goblin Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

You know how to wield your people's vicious weapons. Whenever you score a critical hit using a [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Goblin Weapon Frenzy
